DOC.brief_summary: This study conducted in Europe. The aim of this study is to evaluated the use of insulin detemir (Levemir®) in insufficiently controlled patients with type 1 or type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Use of Levemir® in Insufficiently Controlled Patients With Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients with insufficiently controlled type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus under their previous therapy
